About Bogomolets National Medical University

Bogomolets National Medical University in Ukraine was founded by Tsar Nicholas I. It is one of the oldest and renowned{" "} medical college in Ukraine {" "} and it has been named after physiologist Alexander. A. Bogomolets. The duration of the MBBS course in this University is 6 years including the period of internship. The courses are taught in English. It is one of the best medical colleges in Ukraine.

Indian Student Admission Procedure

The Indian students must follow the following procedure to study at Bogomolets National University

  • {" "} They must clear the interviews in Chemistry, Biology, Physics and the language of instruction
  • {" "} If they are interested to study or take up any course in Ukrainian language, they must follow a preparatory course.
  • {" "} The students are required to submit attested documents at the time of admission
  • {" "} An offer letter will be received by the student once the interview process gets over.

Eligibility Criteria of Bogomolets National University

The students who are interested to study MBBS from the best MBBS university in Ukraine should have the following eligibility criteria

  • {" "} The student should have studied science subjects in 10+2 with physics, chemistry and biology. The student should have secured 70% marks in these subjects.
  • {" "} They should be above the age of 17 years to study from the best MBBS university in Ukraine.
  • {" "} The students should qualify the NEET examination as per the rules of Indian health ministry.
  • {" "} The students should have studied English in 10 + 2
  • {" "} The students must not be more than 25 years of age.
Requirements for MBBS admission to study in the best MBBS University in Ukraine- at Bogomolets National Medical University
  • {" "} A complete filled application form with all accurate details.
  • {" "} Original and photocopies of Passport.
  • {" "} Birth certificates and other mandatory certificates must be submitted to the concerned authority.
  • {" "} Passport size (3cmX4cm) photographs.
  • {" "} Original and a photocopy of mark sheets of both 10th & 12th standard
  • {" "} A scorecard of NEFT (if required)
  • {" "} Transfer certificate from the previous school
  • {" "} Leaving certificate from the concerned school
  • {" "} A certificate of code of conduct must be submitted
  • {" "} The bank copy of guardians must be submitted which indicates that they have sufficient funds to pay the fees to Bogomolets National Medical University
  • {" "} A medical checkup certificate is also essential

Facilities at Bogomolets National Medical University

The infrastructure at{" "} Bogomolets National Medical University {" "} is excellent. There are laboratories and medical equipments for the purpose of medical study

There are also hostel facilities at the campus, which makes the university the best choice for the student

Bogomolets National Medical University- Advantages for Indian Students
  • {" "} The cost of education and the living cost is affordable
  • {" "} It is one of the best medical colleges in Ukraine
  • {" "} It is recognized by WHO and MCI
  • {" "} Preparation for MCI screening test is done at the University
  • {" "} The university provides a safe environment for the students.
New-Lyf education is the authorized Indian partner for Bogomolets National Medical University
  • {" "} The medical education is taught in English/Russian language in Kharkiv National Medical University
  • {" "} It is recognized with WHO and MCI
  • {" "} This university conducts Guest lectures and seminars by experts
  • {" "} It also offers bilateral student exchange program with European universities
  • {" "} After study MBBS in Ukraine, the students can have lots of opportunities to work in abroad
  • {" "} The students will get a top-notch medical education to clear FMGE exam.
  • {" "} The students will get basic medicine knowledge including theoretical as well as practical knowledge from the top-class faculty members offering the high standard of education.
New-Lyf Authorized Indian Partner

New-Lyf education is the authorized partner for the admission to the Bogomolets National Medical University which is one of the{" "} best medical colleges in Ukraine . New-Lyf education provides proper counseling and helps the students in the entire admission process at Bogomolets National Medical University. All the information is provided to the student and all the doubts are cleared before the final step in admission at Bogomolets National Medical University- one of the best medical colleges in Ukraine.
